intro.description: This cheat sheet guides you through the order recognition rule created by the design pattern.

item.title: Verify Order Recognition Rules: SOM_RecognitionRule
item.description:
The recognition rule has the Description, Namespace, Input Message, and Target Order set according to the entries in the design pattern.
Template XQuery modules for Recognition Rule in the Recognition subtab and Order Data Rule in the Transformation subtab have been placed in the resources/OrderRecognitionRule directory, and the location of these files has been added to the catalog.xml file using the ResourceURI value entered in the design pattern. These XQuery templates need to be modified for your specific business logic.
